feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 03:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:43 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:43 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:43 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
